That stands for
Daily Quiet Time.

1643.text:
A DQT is a time that we need
to set aside every

1646.text: day to spend with the Lord.

1649.text:
We read the Bible, we
pray, and listen to him.

1653.text:
It's the most
important part of every day.

1657.text:
We have written a devotional
that will help you begin

1663.text:
Every day, you'll get a
Scripture, a brief thought,

1666.text:
and a prayer
delivered right to your tablet,

1670.text:
It's easy to read
wherever you are.

1673.text:
To get your
devotional, go to our website,

1676.text:
winningwalk.org, and
sign up for the devotional.

1681.text:
It is a simple way to
make that DQT a built in,

1686.text:
regular, scheduled
part of your life.
